casename: Management Corporation Strata Title Plan No 1938 v Goodview Properties Pte Ltd
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; L P Thean JA
counsel: Choi Yok Hung and Rodney Keong (Bih Li & Lee) for the appellants; Philip Jeyaretnam and Brendon Choa (Helen Yeo & Partners) for the respondents
tags-parsed: Land/Strata titles/Management corporation/Management corporation instituting action on behalf of some subsidiary proprietors/Whether necessary for all subsidiary proprietors to act together against developers in respect of common property/Whether management corporation entitled to sue developers on behalf of two or more subsidiary proprietors/s 116(1) Land Titles (Strata) Act (Cap 158, 1999 Ed)

Words and Phrases/'The lots concerned'/s 116(1) Land Titles (Strata) Act (Cap 158, 1999 Ed)
